instance_details.name: Reddthat
instance_details.description: A friendly front page to a small part of the internet. Community funded & run for the community
instance_details.sidebar:
# Welcome to Reddthat!

## About Us
We believe in putting the power back in the hands of our users – our community members are the backbone of our service, and they play a critical role in curating and shaping the content that we offer.

As a member of our community, you have a say in shaping the direction of our platform. Whether you're submitting a link, voting on content, or participating in discussions, your voice matters. We're committed to continually improving our service based on the feedback and ideas of our members.

## Instance Rules

Our Instance [rules are here](https://reddthat.com/post/9701) and cover the ideals and how we want this community to evolve. 

## Funding
Our instance is 100% community-funded. Help keep it running by donating on [OpenCollective](https://opencollective.com/reddthat/contribute/backer-58742/checkout). This allows us to be completely transparent with costs and budgeting.

We currently have [![](https://opencollective.com/reddthat/tiers/badge.svg?label=Total%20Unique%20Donators)](https://opencollective.com/reddthat)  

For more information about our operating costs is in our post titled [Funding & Longevity](https://reddthat.com/post/25633)

## Thankyou

Thank-you for joining our little community. Because, without **you**, this community wouldn't be what it is today. <3

Tiff

instance_details.name: Mander
instance_details.description: An instance dedicated to nature and science.
instance_details.sidebar:
We follow Lemmy's [code of conduct](https://join-lemmy.org/docs/en/code_of_conduct.html). 

Please be respectful to each other. 

The main focus of this instance is the natural sciences, and the scope encompasses all of the STEM fields. 

As a member of the fediverse, you can create your account here and interact with any other federated community!


To find communities all over the Lemmyverse you can use one of the following community browsers:

https://browse.feddit.de/

https://lemmyverse.net/communities

To fetch a community, simply copy and paste the community's URL into the search box in Mander.

instance_details.name: Exploding Heads
instance_details.tagline: **Diverse opinions, discussion, and debate are welcome**
instance_details.description: Have fun helping hold the ruling class accountable
instance_details.sidebar:
We are a fun loving community of free people tired of propaganda fed to us government, media, big tech, crony capitalists, and self anointed elites.

Blow off some steam and enjoy a lively community that posts about anything & everything including:
- sports and gaming
- health and fitness
- politics and world affairs
- business and finance
- bitcoin and crypto.

Feel free to have your say. We welcome diverse opinions.

We also maintain the [Tyranny Prevention Project](http://tyranny.exploding-heads.com/) wiki where we take ideas discussed on Exploding Heads and lay out a set of foundations we need to put in place to protect us from tyrannical rule.

**Rules**
- Be authentic.
- Be respectful. Everyone should feel welcome here.
- No porn.
- No bots
- No ads / spamming.
- No trolling
- No doxing
- No threats or personal insults
- No discrimination
- No gore or graphic video or pictures
- When posting on a federated instance/community, obey the rules of that instance/community.

instance_details.name: szmer
instance_details.tagline: Reddit i Wypok to coś jak Szmer, tylko z reklamami...
instance_details.sidebar:
Możesz współtworzyć ten serwis, jeśli tylko zechcesz! [Przeczytaj jak działa](https://szmer.info/post/356383), [publikuj](https://szmer.info/create_post) interesujące Cię materiały w stosownych [społecznościach](https://szmer.info/communities) lub jeśli brakuje odpowiedniej [stwórz nową!](https://szmer.info/create_community)

Nie wiesz od czego zacząć? Wybierz interesujące Cię zagadnienia z posortowanej tematycznie [listy](https://szmer.info/post/365868) społeczności!

Wszelkie uwagi i problemy z działaniem naszego serwisu możecie zgłaszać w społeczności [wspólnota](https://szmer.info/c/wspolnota), na [naszym kanale dyskusyjnym](https://app.element.io/#/room/#szmer:matrix.org) w sieci matrix lub pisząc na szmer@riseup.net.

Działamy bez reklam i śledzenia, jednak ma to swoje realne koszta. Jeśli jesteś w stanie i chcesz nas wesprzeć będziemy bardzo wdzięczni; przyjmujemy datki przez nasz profil na [liberapay](https://pl.liberapay.com/szmer.info/) :)  

ZASADY:

-> z szacunkiem - każda osoba powinna się tu czuć mile widziana

-> żadnej bigoterii - w tym rasizmu, seksizmu, homofobii, ksenofobii itd

-> żadnego porno - przynajmniej dopóki nie powstaną zamknięte/prywatne grupy

-> żadnych reklam/spamu  
  
-> jeśli za treść trzeba zapłacić korporacji, mile widziany jest alternatywny link gdzie nie trzeba

instance_details.name: monero.town
instance_details.description: A town for the Monero community to live in.
instance_details.sidebar:
-------
To save on server-storage, please consider using third-party providers like if you want to post images, thanks!
I reccommend https://sm.ms/ since they provide markdown links (if you don't care that they are chinese) or https://catbox.moe/.
______

-    Don’t do unto others what you don’t want done unto you.
-   No content breaking german laws. **Instant Ban.**
-   No spamming or off-topic ads.
-   Stay on topic in a community and follow its rules.
-   For news posts, include links. Posts consisting of just screenshots will be removed.

______
Consider donating to help pay hosting for this website:
`43townyvWJ82Ct4xWKrgAMJyfcbtUNfA6VVhgXWiH6pdgexBvcU8AnfTXDecaP12cqM7d7jYiriAwiyFff1o5C8xEBiLU3h` or help out by using [this Trocador link](https://trocador.app/?ref=YFJL36Szy7) when swapping crypto.
______

#### Information

-    [Website](https://www.getmonero.org/)
 -    [Monero GitHub](https://github.com/monero-project/monero)
 -    [Monero StackExchange](https://monero.stackexchange.com/)
 -    [Bounties](https://bounties.monero.social/)
 -    [Matrix Rooms](https://view.matrix.org/?query=monero)

#### Wallets

A list of popular wallets can be found [here](https://www.getmonero.org/downloads/).
####  Mining

The easiest way to get started with mining is by following the [Gupax guide](https://gupax.io/guide/). 

More advanced users can read [How to mine on p2pool](https://github.com/SChernykh/p2pool#how-to-mine-on-p2pool).

#### Exchanging

A list of popular exchanges and swaps can be found [here](https://kycnot.me/).

instance_details.name: CompuVerse
instance_details.tagline:
A Universe of Technology!

CompuVerse is a Lemmy instance aimed at providing a central community for all things tech! UK-based, but all are welcome.
instance_details.sidebar:
# Welcome to CompuVerse!
CompuVerse is a collective of communities spanning all of technology.

--- 
### Our Communities
We have communities for:
- [AI / Machine Learning](/c/machinelearning)
- [VR / Virtual Reality](/c/virtualreality)
- [Gaming](/c/gaming)
- [Retro Gaming](/c/retrogaming)
- [Speedrunning](/c/speedruning)
- [Game Deals](/c/gamedeals)
- [Programming](/c/programming)
- [Tech Support](/c/techsupport)
- [Tech Support Gore](/c/techsupportgore)
- [Mobile Technology](/c/mobile)
- [General Computing](/c/computing)
- [Retro Computing](/c/retrocomputing)
- [Self-Hosting](/c/selfhosting)
- [Blu-ray Media](/c/bluray)

And [Loads more!](/communities/listing_type/Local/page/1)

Feel free to join and create your own technology communities!

Anything tech goes!

##### Want to discuss CompuVerse itself?
Please visit the [Meta](/c/meta) community!

##### Want to talk about something that's not Tech?
Feel free to use our [Off-Topic](/c/offtopic) board!

---
### Rules
Our rules are generally quite simple, don't be a tool.

You can see a more detailed list in the:
[Rules & Guidelines](https://compuverse.uk/post/1)

---
#### Not Interested in Technology?
*If you're interested in the fediverse, but not specifically about technology, you're still free to register an account and use our site to access other instances across the fediverse! All are welcome.*

*Alternatively, you can find other more general Lemmy instances here: https://join-lemmy.org/instances*


---
## Sign up now!
Ready to join the CompuVerse community? [Sign up here](https://compuverse.uk/signup) and start connecting with fellow tech enthusiasts!

instance_details.name: Comfy Snugs
instance_details.description: A place where you can be Comfy and Snug
instance_details.sidebar:
General Rules:
- No content that is illegal under US Law
- NSFW content MUST be tagged appropriately
- Do not embed NSFW videos outside of NSFW Communities. Lemmy does not currently blur NSFW video thumbnails. Until they fix this, please post as a link in the body instead.
- Please do not spam and/or advertise products.
- Treat others as you would like to be treated. Unless you like being treated like shit. *We don't do that here.*

instance_details.name: Goldsmith Household
instance_details.description: Private instance of Mr. Goldsmith and friends.

instance_details.name: Baraza
instance_details.description: Africa and its relations with the world. Karibu.
instance_details.sidebar:
You can view content as:
- All - gathered from *all places* we are federating with.
- Subscribed - gathered only from the places *you* have subscribed to.
- Local - gathered from *baraza* only.  

Communities in this space can take whichever direction they wish, as long as they uphold these rules:

1. No bigotry -- including racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia, or xenophobia. 
2. Be respectful -- this is a safe space where everyone and their ideas should be heard, just as they are also responsible for them.
3. Be conscious -- while the community might answer some or all of your questions, low-effort questions that can be easily searched online are a waste of everyone's time. 
4. No pornography. 
5. No ads/spamming/soliciting or providing personal details like emails or phone numbers. 

This instance is powered by Lemmy, a federated link-aggregator, and is connected to Mastodon, another fediverse project. 

Feel free to ask questions over at the  [chat post](https://baraza.africa/post/137).

instance_details.name: mimiclem.me
instance_details.sidebar:
The better front page of the internet.

Mimic is a general-purpose personal instance of Lemmy, a self-hostable, decentralized alternative to Reddit and other link aggregators.

Due to being a personal instance, I make no guarantees of uptime or stability. 

To save on server-storage, please consider using third-party providers like imgur if you want to post images, thanks!

For the best experience, set your default post type to “All” and your default sort type to “Hot” in your profile settings.

General community creation is disabled on Mimic, so if you’re hoping to do that you should probably register your account on a different Lemmy instance.

Some communities to check out first:

Tech → !technology@beehaw.org
News → !news@beehaw.org
Memes → !memes@sopuli.xyz
Music → !music@beehaw.org
Books → !literature@beehaw.org

More…

What are the rules here?

No pornography.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States, Germany, or Finland
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Do not spam or abuse network features.

instance_details.name: sullen.social
instance_details.sidebar:
Welcome to Lemmy! sullen.social can host you!

Feel free to start your community here. Checkout !series_of_tubes@sullen.social for an example of the vibe of this instance, but don't be afraid to branch out.

My goal is to keep this instance well federated, a crossroads in the fediverse. You can help that cause by searching for and subscribing to external instances, which will increase the variety in the 'All' feed.
Ways to find new communities on Lemmy:
- https://lemmyverse.net/ (copy the url of your community into the search page, wait a few seconds for it to show up, then follow the link and subscribe to them)
